title: Marseille Provence XV
text:
Marseille Provence XV is a defunct French <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> club, founded in 2000. The team played at the Stade <a href="Roger%20Couderc">Roger Couderc</a> in <a href="Marseille">Marseille</a>, <a href="France">France</a>.
The club debuted in <a href="F%C3%A9d%C3%A9rale%203">Fédérale 3</a> (third amateur division) in the 2000–01 season. They were promoted after the 2001–02 season to Fédérale 2, and went up again in 2003 to Fédérale 1, though they went back down to Fédérale 2 for two seasons, they were promoted back up to Fédérale 1 for the 2006–07 season.
After that season, the club merged with another local club, Vitrolles de Rugby à XV. The new club, <a href="Marseille%20Vitrolles%20Rugby">Marseille Vitrolles Rugby</a>, began its life in Fédérale 2 in 2007–08, and earned promotion to Fédérale 1 for 2008–09. Marseille Vitrolles play at Marseille Provence's former home ground.
